# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates an input view from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Initializing an input view

- **init(frame:inputViewStyle:)**: Initializes and returns an input view using the specified style information.
